actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, Treasury.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide temporary authority for the necessary processing of Federal benefit checks and other disbursements.

summary.text: Authorizes the Bureau of Government Financial Operations or its successor, until August 15, 1982, to: (1) issue Federal benefit payments and other authorized Government disbursements to the extent funds are available; and (2) carry out necessary accounting and other operations directly related to such disbursements. Authorizes the use of unobligated funds appropriated to the Department of the Treasury for such administrative expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide temporary authority for the necessary processing of Federal benefit checks and other disbursements.
